description.narrative: In 2019, the Country Office continued to support the expansion of the new interoperability birth registration mechanism implemented in 924 of 1,481 maternities (62 per cent); the special operation for birth registration ended with an official distribution of 630,000 birth certificates to primary school children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/02/2020
